alert.note: Alert for Isabella (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 10:58AM EDT until May 11 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Isabella County in central Michigan... * Until 1145 AM EDT. * At 1058 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oil City, or 6 miles south of Coleman, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant... Shepherd... Rosebush... Delwin... Loomis... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
